TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBindingList implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type IBindingList = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IList
type IBindingList = interface interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供在绑定到数据源时支持复杂方案和简单方案所需的功能。

span.span: Provides the features required to support both complex and simple scenarios when binding to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由 类实现。This interface is implemented by the class. 方法的实现应显示与类中该方法的实现相同的行为 。Implementation of a method should exhibit the same behavior as the implementation of that method in the class. 调用 或 方法时，应引发 带有枚举的事件 。When you call the or methods, you should raise a event with the enumeration. 调用 方法时，应引发 带有包含 相应索引的枚举的事件。When you call the method, you should raise a event with the enumeration carrying the appropriate index. 添加的行处于一种状态，在该状态下，按下 ESC 可以删除新行。The added row is in a state where pressing the ESC on a control can remove the new row. 第二次使用枚举引发事件时，第二次指示该项现在为不处于 "新" 状态的行。Raising the event with the enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a row not in the "new" state. 当您删除某个项或对 新行调用该方法时 (如果该行实现了 ) ，则应引发 带有 适当索引的枚举的事件。When you remove an item or call the method on a new row (if that row implements ), you should raise a event with the enumeration carrying the appropriate index. ## Examples 下面的示例提供接口的简单实现 。The following example provides a simple implementation of the interface. `CustomerList`类在列表中存储客户信息。The `CustomerList` class stores customer information in a list. 此示例假设你已使用可在 `Customer` 类中的示例中找到的类 。This example assumes that you have used the `Customer` class that can be found in the example in the class. [!code-cpp[Binding_Editable#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Binding_Editable/CPP/binding_editable.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Binding_Editable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Binding_Editable/CS/binding_editable.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Binding_Editable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Binding_Editable/VB/binding_editable.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNew() cil managed

span.span: Adds a new item to the list.
The item added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当为时才支持此方法 `true` ; 否则， 将引发。This method is supported only if is `true`; otherwise, a is thrown. 实现此方法意味着 列表必须了解要添加到列表中的对象的类型，并且必须了解如何创建该类型的新实例。Implementing this method means that the list must understand the type of objects to add to the list and must understand how to create a new instance of that type. 例如，如果您有一个 `myCustomer` 对象集合，则该 方法应向列表中添加一个新的 `myCustomer` 对象。For example, if you have a collection of `myCustomer` objects, the method should add a new `myCustomer` object to the list. > [!NOTE] > 如果此列表中的对象实现 接口，则在 使用方法创建对象时，调用方法应丢弃对象，而不是将其添加到列表 。If the objects in this list implement the interface, calling the method should discard an object, not add it to the list, when the object was created using the method. 调用方法时，只应将对象添加到列表 。The object should only be added to the list when the method is called. 因此，你必须仔细同步对象和列表。Therefore, you must synchronize the object and the list carefully. 调用此方法时，应引发 包含带有 相应索引的枚举的事件。When this method is called, you should raise a event with the enumeration carrying the appropriate index. 添加的行处于一种状态，在该状态下，控件上的命中 Esc 可以删除新行。The added row is in a state where hitting Esc on a control can remove the new row. 在此行上第二次引发带有枚举的事件指示该项现在为普通行 (不处于新状态) 。Raising the event with the enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a normal row (not in new state).
